title: 'Great Product'
body: 'Amazingly this product has surprised me. In a low cost has a lot of features. Good reception
column7: flash torch. What else can we expect at this price? Pagaria brand should have included USB C rather than Micro USB.'

title: 'Innovative Radio-917 Set Pagaria'
body: 'Superb Radio-917 Set. Size of the set is small with all good features checked .  @Superior Qualities: Excellent loud Sound quality with clarity with out distortion at maximum volume.  @ Bluetooth: BT connectivity very good.  @ USB/TF: Quality is nice. Super clarity.  @ FM reception is super. External antenna is working effectively for FM. @ AM is also good. @ SW : 4 SW Bands are receiving signals
column5: especially in night hours. May be required one more external antenna for clearer reception.  @ Tuning knobs are smooth & effective.  @ Side LED light is good & bright.  @ Earphone/Head phone jack provided. It is good .  @ USB Out from Power Bank side port is extraordinary design to charge Mobile on emergency.  @ So with this Small Radio unit
column6: it creates Loud sound (5W) with crystal clear clarity. Really to be appreciated to include all basic features.  @ Radio lifting Sling provided. It is nice.  @ "Backup" is good as mentioned with 4 hours of charging time. To be checked after few weeks.  @ Quality of "Pagaria" Radio should not be compared with other similar Radios existing in Market.  @ Price is worth and value for Money & you can\'t buy another similar brand Radio with all features.  @@Improvement Required@@ : @ On/Off switch should be given separately. So every time we have to move the slide bar.  @ Battery indicator level to be required. @ "Printed scale" for FM & SW3 in blue color is NOT clearly visible . Color should be different for visibility.  I appreciate Melody India/Pagaria to Lunch such a beautiful Radio set for Radio Listeners. Great Job.  Recommended to all ages.'

title: 'All in one great purchase.'
body: 'All great. But best is body and fitment. Simply value for money. Looks great. Work great. Bettery life also best as of one month of use. Not recoment for elders but great for overall use.'

title: 'Pagaria R 917 best than any other radio'
body: The media could not be loaded. It is easy to use it has a band switch through which you can also on off and switch to various modes of radio and mp3 its return policy is also excellent you will also get a warranty card through which you can register it for warranty on melody media website it also has an excellent battery life and on a single charge if you listen it's battery life can go upto 2 days although it is a value for money a full money justifier...

title: 'All in one device in a reasonable price.'
body: 'I got it and using for a 5w Bluetooth speaker since radio reception is very poor especially for FM. Build quality is nice
column7: bluetooth connectivity and even torch is also good but if you value a radio for its radio quality then remember
column8: this product is not for you. XHdata d219 will be a nice deal in 1200 INR if you are a true radio lover with the similar budget. So
column9: all is depend on you. This product may be a multy function package with a compromise of a sensitive radio.  Edit on 14 Sept... DSP chip response is good
column10: so I am increasing two star more (from 2 to 4). Problem is the small length of antenna which is insufficient to pull the distant stations. Iam in fringe area where FM stations are around 100 Kms. far. AM
column11: especially M.W. statons are also at the same distance but with dense disturbance due to TV towers
column13: cable amplifiers and so many other reasons. So
column14: FM is the option. Problem of small antenna can be solve by external antenna and signal booster. Suggest any remedy if available in budget price.'

title: 'Wonderful Device'
body: It's a small package with loads of entertainment. FM, AM , Bluetooth, Memory card, USB , Light ufff....what else such a handy device can have. I loved it's size and performance. I had been using from past week after 1st full charge it's still running smooth. 5 out of 5 for this wonderful package.

title: 'Nice Radio'
body: 'Reviewing after using 1 month: Pros: FM and SW2 n 4 reception is good
column5: other bands are not good. For better indoor reception attached wire and hang it in open space(windows). SD card reader is best. Battery back up is best for FM. Torch is Ok. Build Quality is good and size is small so you can carry if you go for picnic.  Cons: It will be Difficult for senior citizen to tune radio station as it is manual process
column6: also station frequency printed in very small font not possible to read for old person.  Overall: Not for senior citizen
